snippet: The drawing, dating from around 1519, was created as a study for a figure in one of the artist's greatest late paintings, "Transfiguration,'' that belongs to the Vatican Museum in Rome.
abstract: The drawing, dating from around 1519, was created as a study for a figure in one of the artist's greatest late paintings, "Transfiguration,'' that belongs to the Vatican Museum in Rome.

headline.main: Raphael's 'Head of an Apostle' Heading to Auction at Sotheby's
headline.print_headline: Raphael’s ‘Head of an Apostle’ Heading to Auction
